text: "She Will Be Loved" is the third single off the debut album by rock band Maroon 5 called Songs About Jane. The song is also the fourth track off the album. The song was released in June 2004. == Music video == The video features Adam Levine (lead singer of Maroon 5) who falls in love with his girlfriend's mother. She is played by Kelly Preston and is being victimized by her husband. The band is briefly shown in the video. == Track list == # "She Will Be Loved" # "This Love" (Kanye West Remix) # "Closer" (Live Acoustic Version) == Chart rankings == "She Will Be Loved" ranked No. 4 on the U.S. Billboard Hot Adult Contemporary Tracks and No. 5 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. Category:2002 songs Category:Adultery in fiction Category:Maroon 5 songs Category:Rock ballads Category:Songs about infidelity
title: She Will Be Loved
